name: Bloodtender
description:
Bloodtender is a turn-based strategy game where your main method of restoring health will also damage you. Although it comes at a price, it can be a strong tool to help swing the tides of battle in your favor.

Note:
I do not take any credit in making the art or music. All sources I found for them are listed below. I only take credit in programming and designing the game.

Background Art:
https://aethrall.itch.io/demon-woods-parallax-background
https://szadiart.itch.io/pixel-platformer-world

Character Art:
https://aamatniekss.itch.io/fantasy-knight-free-pixelart-animated-character
https://creativekind.itch.io/nightborne-warrior
https://9e0.itch.io/witches-pack
https://jesse-m.itch.io/skeleton-pack
https://penusbmic.itch.io/monster-pack-i

Other Art:

https://opengameart.org/content/simple-blood-splatter
https://opengameart.org/content/bloodspatter-and-gibs
https://opengameart.org/content/sword-normal

Sounds:
